Effect: Arcane Cascade: Don Visage.name: Effect: Arcane Cascade: Don Visage
Effect: Arcane Cascade: Don Visage.description:
For the duration, you can use your visage to perform the associated actions with your Arcana instead of the normal skill. You deal 1 additional damage of the same type as the arcane cascade stance to creatures as long as they are affected by the associated action from your visage. This damage increases to 2 if you have weapon specialization or to 3 if you have greater weapon specialization.

  • Fearsome Your skill action is @UUID[Compendium.magus.magus-macros.Macro.0CUA0IoROLfIKCEq]{Demoralize}. When you use your visage to Demoralize it gains the visual trait and loses the linguistic and auditory traits.
  • Jovial Your skill action is @UUID[Compendium.magus.magus-macros.Macro.KeRdZBkxJGLLYhTN]{Bon Mot}, and you can use Bon Mot even if you do not have the skill feat. It gains the visual trait and loses the linguistic and auditory traits, but your opponent only needs to use a single action with the concentrate trait to retort.
  • Mysterious Your skill actions are @UUID[Compendium.magus.magus-macros.Macro.ktRy5et6OdHTO4vN]{Feint}, @UUID[Compendium.magus.magus-macros.Macro.7gPdrGtDD8eh51kr]{Hide}, and @UUID[Compendium.magus.magus-macros.Macro.uSOQA4j55M11rK4k]{Sneak}. You gain the additional damage from Don Visage against creatures that are off-guard to you as a result of these actions or being undetected or unnoticed.

Effect: Arcane Cascade: Invigorate.name: Effect: Arcane Cascade: Invigorate
Effect: Arcane Cascade: Invigorate.description:
Trigger You reduce a creature to 0 Hit Points with a spell or Spellstrike.

Requirements You are wielding your black blade.

Your black blade becomes invigorated and your melee Strikes with it deal 1 additional damage for 1 minute. This additional damage increases to 2 if you have weapon specialization and 3 if you have greater weapon specialization. This damage is of the same type as the Arcane Cascade stance. Strikes that benefit from this damage gain the arcane trait, making them magical.

If your black blade uses this ability on a creature below your level, you must attempt a Will save against its Ego.

Despite being a minion, your black blade gains 1 reaction at the start of its turns, which it can use for Invigorate and other reaction abilities it gains from being a black blade.

Effect: Arcane Cascade: Puppet String.name: Effect: Arcane Cascade: Puppet String
Effect: Arcane Cascade: Puppet String.description: You are considered to be in Arcane Cascade as long as you have at least one puppet string attached to a creature.

Effect: Arcane Cascade: Slidecast.name: Effect: Arcane Cascade: Slidecast
Effect: Arcane Cascade: Slidecast.description: You gain a +1 status bonus to your Reflex saves against effects that target an area for 2 rounds. This bonus lasts for 3 rounds if you have weapon specialization, or 4 rounds if you have greater weapon specialization.

Effect: Arcane Cascade: Spell ignition.name: Effect: Arcane Cascade: Spell ignition
Effect: Arcane Cascade: Spell ignition.description: You cause ambient magic in the area to burn, making the air thick with palpable magic. This creates an area of ambient magic that lasts for 2 rounds. The area of ambient magic occupies the target’s space or the area of effect of the spell you cast. Creatures other than you that end their turn within an area of ambient magic take damage equal to the level of the spell you cast with a  @Check[type:fortitude|dc:resolve(@actor.attributes.spellDC.value)|basic:true] save against your spell DC, or half that amount if the spell you cast was a cantrip (minimum 1). This damage is of the same type as the arcane cascade stance. The ambient magic lasts for 3 rounds if you have weapon specialization, or 4 rounds if you have greater weapon specialization.

Effect: Battlemage's Apotheosis: Ultimat.name: Effect: Battlemage's Apotheosis: Ultimate Radiance
Effect: Battlemage's Apotheosis: Ultimat.description:
You enter Arcane Cascade and gain additional effects:

  • You exude bright light out to 20 feet and dim light 20 feet after that,
  • You gain a fly speed equal to your Speed.
  • You gain regeneration (deactivated by force damage or critical hits) 15.

These benefits last as long as you remain in your current Arcane Cascade stance.

Effect: Body Essence - Traded Havok.name: Effect: Body Essence - Traded Havok
Effect: Body Essence - Traded Havok.description: After you use an action with the Havok trait, you are off-guard for 1 minute or until you make a successful Strike.

Effect: Diametric Weapon.name: Effect: Diametric Weapon
Effect: Diametric Weapon.description: During your daily preparations, choose two one-handed melee weapons in which you are trained to be your diametric weapons. When you are wielding these weapons, they gain the twin trait and are treated as the same weapon type for the purposes of the twin trait. If the two weapons you chose already had the twin trait and were the same weapon type, increase the damage from the twin trait by 1 per weapon damage die.

Effect: Essence Eating Shell - Transmuta.name: Effect: Essence Eating Shell - Transmutation
Effect: Essence Eating Shell - Transmuta.description: While a creature is sickened they also take a -10 foot status penalty to their Speeds.

Effect: Essence Mystic Dedication.name: Effect: Essence Mystic Dedication
Effect: Essence Mystic Dedication.description: When you cast a conflux spell that does not have the havok trait, you can choose to give it the havok trait, giving you a +1 status bonus to any attacks you make as part of Casting the Spell and doubling the damage ([[/r 2*@actor.level]]) from your havok cascade until the beginning of your next turn.

Effect: Flaying Spellstrike.name: Effect: Flaying Spellstrike
Effect: Flaying Spellstrike.description: The creature gains a weakness of 3 to a damage type of your choice that lasts until the end of your next turn or double this amount if you critically succeed. The base weakness amount increases to 5 if you have weapon specialization or 7 if you have greater weapon specialization. The target gains these weaknesses before your Spellstrike deals damage.

Effect: Heart Essence - Traded Havok.name: Effect: Heart Essence - Traded Havok
Effect: Heart Essence - Traded Havok.description: After you use an action with the havok trait, you are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Clumsy 1} or increase your clumsy value by 1 if you were already clumsy for 1 minute or until you make a successful Strike.

Effect: Imposing Spellstrike.name: Effect: Imposing Spellstrike
Effect: Imposing Spellstrike.description:
The appearance of your mighty armor is enough to make even the most foolhardy of opponents doubt themselves. Make a Spellstrike. It gains the following effects in addition to the normal effects of your Spellstrike.

Critical Success The target takes a –2 status penalty to its Will saves and a –3 status penalty to fear effects until the end of your next turn.

Success The target takes a –1 status penalty to its Will saves and a –2 status penalty to fear effects until the end of your next turn.

Effect: Living Grimoire.name: Effect: Living Grimoire
Effect: Living Grimoire.description: The target becomes @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Dazzled]{Dazzled} until the end of your next turn if your Spellstrike was a success or 1 minute if it was a critical success. Creatures that are dazzled from this effect take a –1 circumstance penalty to their attack rolls against you as long as they are dazzled.

Effect: Mediation of Insight.name: Effect: Mediation of Insight
Effect: Mediation of Insight.description: The next time you roll initiative for an encounter, you can choose to state a specific action or activity as the first action or activity for your first turn. Once you do, this action is locked in and you must attempt it on your first turn. If you fail to perform this action or otherwise are unable to take the action mentioned, you lose any actions that would have been required to take the named action. When you attempt your declared action, you gain a +1 status bonus to the first attack roll or check you attempt and you treat the degree of success on a result of a failure or critical failure as one better.

Effect: Mind Essence - Traded Havok.name: Effect: Mind Essence - Traded Havok
Effect: Mind Essence - Traded Havok.description: After you use an action with the Havok trait, you are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Stupefied 1} or increase your stupefied value by 1 if you were already stupefied for 1 minute or until you make a successful Strike.

Effect: Mind Essence Bolstered Havok Wea.name: Effect: Mind Essence Bolstered Havok Weakness
Effect: Mind Essence Bolstered Havok Wea.description: When you succeed at a Recall Knowledge against a creature with your Forbidden Lore, they gain a weakness equal to half your level to damage of the same type as your Arcane Cascade for 1 round.

Effect: Perfect Arcane Form.name: Effect: Perfect Arcane Form
Effect: Perfect Arcane Form.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.magus.magus-feats.Item.gxN18YxOEr2jfe7i]{Perfect Arcane Form}

As you allow your magic to flow through you, you overlap yourself with the ideal arcane form that you channel your spells from. This form may look identical to you, or it may have extra ethereal arms, glowing organs, or some other unusual appearance. You enter a battle form for 1 minute. You have hands in this battle form and can take actions with the manipulate trait. While you are in this battle form, you gain the benefits of Arcane Cascade and are considered to be in Arcane Cascade for the purposes of feats or activities that would require it. You also gain the following benefits.

  • 20 temporary Hit Points.
  • If you were Medium or smaller, you can increase your size to Large provided you have the space to do so and your unarmed attacks reach increases by 5 feet (or by 10 feet if it started out Tiny).
  • A fly Speed equal to your Speed.
  • A +1 status bonus to saves against spells.
  • You gain a precise sense with a range of 30 feet that enables you to sense arcane magic and creatures or items with the arcane trait.
  • Increase the damage die of your melee unarmed attacks by 1, up to a maximum of d10. If your damage die was already d10 or above, you instead gain a +2 status bonus to damage with your melee unarmed Strikes.
  • You gain a ranged unarmed attack (magical, range increment 30 feet, unarmed), which deals 1d6 force damage.

Effect: Reservoir of Power.name: Effect: Reservoir of Power
Effect: Reservoir of Power.description: When you tap into the inner energies of your arcane cascade’s power, using it to create additional effects. You use Arcane Cascade and you gain an effect depending on the school of your most recent spell that lasts until the end of your next turn.

Effect: Soul Essence - Traded Havok.name: Effect: Soul Essence - Traded Havok
Effect: Soul Essence - Traded Havok.description: Traded Havok After you use an action with the Havok trait, you are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Drained 1} or increase your drained value by 1 if you were already drained. Unlike the normal requirements for the drained condition, you can reduce the drained condition caused by an action with the havok trait by 1 if you make a successful Strike or spend 10 minutes attuning your essences.

Effect: Starlit Span Light.name: Effect: Starlit Span Light
Effect: Starlit Span Light.description: While you are in Arcane Cascade, when you make a ranged Strike, you and targets you successfully hit exude bright light in a 5-foot radius (and dim light for the next 5 feet) for 1 round. The radius of the bright and dim light increases by 10 feet if you have weapon specialization, or 15 feet if you have greater weapon specialization. Your Strikes gain the light trait and the level of this effect is equal to your level.

Effect: Tethered (Puppet String).name: Effect: Tethered (Puppet String)
Effect: Tethered (Puppet String).description:
You create a thread of magic between yourself and the required enemy, tethering them by a puppet string made from the lingering magic of your spell.

This puppet string is broken if a creature spends an Interact action to break it or you and the tethered creature are further than 30 feet from each other.

While tethered, your target takes a –1 status penalty to their Will saves against your spells with the required traits and they gain weakness 1 to mental damage from your spells.

This weakness increases to 2 if you have weapon specialization, or 3 if you have greater weapon specialization.

Effect: They're Mine.name: Effect: They're Mine
Effect: They're Mine.description: Your black blade rolls a Will save against the same effect, replacing your result with its own. If it is under the effects of Invigorate, it gains a status bonus to this save equal to the additional damage it would deal.

Effect: Warded Stitch.name: Effect: Warded Stitch
Effect: Warded Stitch.description: While the warded stitch is active, it provides the target creature with a +1 status bonus to saves against death effects, diseases, negative effects, and poisons. Once during the duration, you or the target creature can use a single action with the concentrate trait to grant the effects of the Battle Medicine to the creature with your warded stitch. When your warded stitch is expended, you immediately recharge your Spellstrike.

Spell Effect: Dual-Pattern Strike.name: Spell Effect: Dual-Pattern Strike
Spell Effect: Dual-Pattern Strike.description: You brand the target with an arcane sigil, giving them a weakness of 2 to one of the following damage types: acid, cold, electricity, fire, force, mental, negative, poison, or positive.

Spell Effect: Metamorphic Armor.name: Spell Effect: Metamorphic Armor
Spell Effect: Metamorphic Armor.description: The base effect that will be used by the @UUID[Compendium.magus.magus-macros.Macro.lCc5jQLfsIu9PufV]{Metamorphic Armor} macro.

Stance: Arcane Cascade+.name: Stance: Arcane Cascade+
Stance: Arcane Cascade+.description:
Requirements You used your most recent action this turn to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.aBQ8ajvEBByv45yz]{Cast a Spell} or make a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.QDW9H8XLIjuW2fE4]{Spellstrike}. You need to meet this requirement only to enter the stance, not to remain in it.

You divert a portion of the spell's magical power and keep it cycling through your body and weapon using specialized forms, breathing, or footwork. While you're in the stance, your melee Strikes deal 1 extra force damage. This damage increases to 2 if you have weapon specialization and 3 if you have greater weapon specialization. Any Strike that benefits from this damage gains the arcane trait, making it magical.

If your most recent spell before entering the stance was one that can deal damage, the damage from the stance is instead the same type that spell could deal (or one type of your choice if the spell could deal multiple types of damage).

Stance: Havok Cascade.name: Stance: Havok Cascade
Stance: Havok Cascade.description:
With strained breath, you call upon the physicality of your master to aid you alongside the spells you have gained from them. When you would enter your Arcane Cascade stance, you enter a Havok Cascade stance, a powerful enhancement to your bolstered essences that follows all the same rules as your Arcane Cascade, but with the additional effects of your Bargained Essences. You gain the wreak havok conflux cantrip.

While you are in the Havok Cascade stance, you can use actions with the havok trait and when you use these actions you take [[/r @actor.level]]{damage equal to your level}. If you resist this damage, remove it, or otherwise avoid taking it, your havok action automatically fails and has no effect.

Technical Effect: Apply Correct Arcane C.name: Technical Effect: Apply Correct Arcane Conservation
Technical Effect: Apply Correct Arcane C.description:
This effect exists purely in the Foundry implementation. Its primary purpose is to act as a stand-in for Arcane Conservations, adding the one you chose (or giving you an option between multiple if you have @UUID[Compendium.magus.magus-feats.Item.NuHWSHDUpDhcuOxM]{Second Conservation}). It itself is hidden, so players will never see it.

As an example, @UUID[Compendium.magus.magus-feats.Item.5MEfIf6X1dAIFz2D]{Battlemage's Apotheosis: Ultimate Radiance} grants you this effect, which then sneakily adds the correct Arcane Conservation.
